overview: The finale of the "Catalogue" series: A cockroach, a woman, a dramatic encounter in a closet— from the roach's point of view. Inspired by "The Passion According to G.H." (1964) by Clarice Lispector. Chicago sound artist A.J. McClenon was commissioned to “play” the empty house by knocking, pounding, scraping different surfaces.
title: The House Is Empty
